# At a glance
  
  - YouTube comment data can be collected via multiple ways through the YouTube Data API v3
  
  - The quantity, formatting, and quality of YouTube comment data can vary depending on the tools used for collection
  
  - The R package [tubecleanR](https://github.com/gesiscss/tubecleanR) provides a set of functions to clean and preprocess YouTube comment data collected using the [tuber](https://github.com/gojiplus/tuber) and [vosonSML](https://github.com/vosonlab/vosonSML) R-packages, bringing them into the same format.
  
  - The prepossessed data can be further used for quantitative and qualitative research, NLP, or visualizations
